mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (ID, PWD, NAME, PHONE, ADDR) VALUES (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{addr})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE ID =#{id}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM REVIEW
WHERE REVIEW_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{query_} || '%'
WHERE ID LIKE '%'|| #{query_} || '%'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS R_NUM, R.* FROM (SELECT * FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{query_} || '%' ORDER BY REVIEW_IDX DESC) R ) WHERE R_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS R_NUM, R.* FROM (SELECT * FROM REVIEW WHERE ID LIKE '%'|| #{query_} || '%' ORDER BY REVIEW_IDX DESC) R ) WHERE R_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
SELECT REVIEW_IDX, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_HIT, REVIEW_IMAGE, ID, REVIEW_CLS, REVIEW_STAR, REVIEW_FILEPATH FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_IDX = #{review_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEW_IDX, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_HIT, REVIEW_IMAGE, ID, REVIEW_CLS, REVIEW_STAR, REVIEW_FILEPATH) VALUES (REVIEW_SEQ1.NEXTVAL, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, SYSDATE, 0, #{review_image}, #{id}, #{review_cls}, #{review_star}, #{review_filepath})
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEW_TITLE = #{review_title}, REVIEW_CONTENT = #{review_content}, REVIEW_IMAGE = #{review_image}, REVIEW_CLS = #{review_cls}, REVIEW_STAR = #{review_star}, REVIEW_FILEPATH = #{review_filepath} WHERE REVIEW_IDX = #{review_idx}
